<font size="4">
Assistant Professor\
Economía, Universidad Pública de Navarra.</font>

I work on macroeconometric issues, particularly:</br>
</br>
<ul>
<li>Applied time series econometrics</li>
<li>Analysis and forecasts of macroeconomic variables</li>
<li>Effects of oil price shocks on macroeconomic variables</li>
</ul>

I hold a PhD in Economics from Universidad de Salamanca, and BA and MA in Economics from Universidad Nacional de Colombia.

I have previously held research position at Universidad Carlos III de Madrid and Universidad Nacional de Colombia.
